name: Time of Magic - Customized House Building
name_original: Time of Magic - Customized House Building
description:
In Time of Magic, you can build a house with porch with click and drag.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/T_o_M_online

Support the game developer on Patreon:
https://Patreon.com/timeofmagic

Click on ground to build. Select "Outdoors" for porch or "Clear" to remove.
Move with WASD, Camera with right mouse button and scroll.
